official_title: Feasibility of Monitoring Step Count as a Measure of Physical Activity in Patients With Newly Diagnosed Glioma Patients Undergoing Radiation Therapy
inclusion_criteria:
* Diagnosed with a glioma and going to receive at least 4 weeks of RT at MDACC at the Texas Medical Center campus with at least 20 fractions
* Karnofsky performance status (KPS) of 70 or above
* Wearable activity tracker (WAT) - naive
* Able to read and speak English
* Able to provide informed consent
* Access to a smartphone
* Access to Wi-Fi
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Cognitive and/or major sensory deficits that would impede the completion of assessment instruments as deemed by the clinical team
